name: Heroic Fantasy Illustration
description: Epic fantasy art in the tradition of classic RPG sourcebooks - vibrant colors, dramatic heroic poses, magical energy effects, medieval armor and weapons gleaming with detail. Think Boris Vallejo meets Larry Elmore.
prompt_fragment: heroic fantasy illustration, dramatic lighting, vibrant saturated colors, epic scale, medieval fantasy armor, glowing magical effects, highly detailed weapons and equipment, adventurer's composition, D&D sourcebook art style

name: Dark Fantasy Grimoire
description: Gritty low-fantasy aesthetic with muted earth tones, weathered textures, and ominous atmosphere. Characters appear battle-worn and realistic rather than idealized. Medieval grime, blood, and mortality emphasized. Warhammer Fantasy meets Darkest Dungeon.
prompt_fragment: dark fantasy art, gritty realism, muted color palette, weathered textures, ominous atmosphere, battle-scarred details, medieval grime, mortality emphasized, low-fantasy aesthetic, grimdark illustration

name: Cosmic Horror Investigator
description: 1920s-1930s period aesthetic with film noir lighting, sepia tones, and creeping wrongness. Emphasizes human fragility against incomprehensible entities. Vintage photography meets eldritch unease - subtle wrongness in proportions, unsettling geometry, creeping shadows. Lovecraftian dread atmosphere.
prompt_fragment: cosmic horror art, 1920s aesthetic, film noir lighting, sepia tone vintage, eldritch atmosphere, unsettling geometry, creeping shadows, subtle wrongness, human fragility emphasized, Lovecraftian dread, investigator period clothing

name: Gothic Horror Cathedral
description: Victorian gothic atmosphere with dramatic chiaroscuro, ornate baroque details, religious imagery corrupted. Velvet darkness punctuated by candlelight, ancient stone, and creeping decay. Combines Vampire: The Masquerade aesthetics with gothic literature illustrations.
prompt_fragment: gothic horror art, Victorian era aesthetic, dramatic chiaroscuro lighting, ornate baroque details, religious imagery, velvet darkness, candlelit atmosphere, ancient stone textures, creeping decay, vampire aesthetic

name: Cyberpunk Neon Streets
description: High-tech dystopian future with vibrant neon colors against dark urban decay. Rain-slicked streets reflecting holographic advertisements, cybernetic augmentations, and corporate megastructures. Blade Runner meets Ghost in the Shell - technological saturation with human grit.
prompt_fragment: cyberpunk art, neon lighting, dystopian future, rain-slicked streets, holographic displays, cybernetic augmentations, urban decay, corporate megastructures, high-tech low-life aesthetic, futuristic noir

name: Grimdark Warfare Chronicle
description: Grim darkness of eternal war - heavily armored warriors in baroque power armor, gothic architecture, skulls as decoration, religious fanaticism meets sci-fi technology. Warhammer 40K aesthetic: everything oversized, over-decorated, and ominously gothic with rich golds and deep reds against gunmetal.
prompt_fragment: grimdark art, Warhammer 40K aesthetic, baroque power armor, gothic architecture, skull decoration, religious iconography, oversized weapons, golden embellishment, gunmetal palette, eternal war atmosphere, grim darkness

name: Post-Apocalyptic Wasteland
description: Civilization's ruins under harsh sun - scavenged equipment, makeshift armor from pre-war materials, dust and decay. Fallout meets Mad Max: desperate survivors, rusted metal, faded colors, and the patina of nuclear aftermath. Weathered, sun-bleached, and jury-rigged.
prompt_fragment: post-apocalyptic art, wasteland aesthetic, scavenged equipment, makeshift armor, rusted metal textures, faded colors, dust and decay, harsh sunlight, survivor desperation, nuclear aftermath, weathered details

name: Oil Portrait Masterwork
description: Classical oil painting technique with rich impasto, visible brushwork, and masterful chiaroscuro. Renaissance to Baroque period aesthetics - deep shadows, luminous highlights, realistic flesh tones, and technical virtuosity. Rembrandt meets Caravaggio: dramatic lighting revealing character.
prompt_fragment: oil painting portrait, classical technique, visible brushwork, impasto texture, chiaroscuro lighting, Renaissance style, baroque drama, luminous highlights, realistic flesh tones, old master quality, museum piece aesthetic

name: Impressionist Brush Study
description: Loose visible brushstrokes capturing light and atmosphere over detail. Soft focus with vibrant color theory - Monet's light experiments meets Renoir's figure work. Emphasis on overall impression and luminous color rather than precise rendering. Painterly and atmospheric.
prompt_fragment: impressionist painting, loose brushwork, visible brush strokes, atmospheric lighting, vibrant color theory, soft focus, luminous quality, light and color emphasis, painterly technique, plein air aesthetic

name: Ink Engraving Antique
description: Black and white cross-hatching and stippling technique from medieval woodcuts to Victorian engravings. Fine linear detail, dramatic contrast, antique book illustration aesthetic. Dürer meets Doré: intricate line work building tone through density.
prompt_fragment: engraving art, cross-hatching technique, stippling detail, black and white, linear precision, antique book illustration, woodcut aesthetic, medieval engraving, dramatic contrast, intricate line work

name: Watercolor Sketch Loose
description: Transparent washes with white paper showing through, soft edge bleeding, and spontaneous flow. Delicate and airy with visible water effects - blooms, granulation, and happy accidents. Combines drawing's immediacy with painting's luminosity.
prompt_fragment: watercolor painting, transparent washes, soft edge bleeding, white paper luminosity, spontaneous flow, delicate technique, visible water effects, airy quality, sketch-like immediacy, artistic looseness

name: Art Nouveau Decorative
description: Flowing organic lines, elaborate decorative borders, stylized natural forms, and elegant figures. Alphonse Mucha's theatrical posters meet Gustav Klimt's ornamental patterns. Curves dominate, with nature motifs and beautiful typography integration.
prompt_fragment: art nouveau style, flowing organic lines, decorative borders, stylized natural forms, elegant composition, Mucha-inspired, ornamental patterns, curved lines, nature motifs, theatrical aesthetic

name: Manga Panel Sequential
description: Japanese comic book aesthetics with dramatic speed lines, exaggerated expressions, screen tone effects, and dynamic action composition. Black and white with bold inks - combines Western comic influence with distinctly Japanese visual storytelling conventions.
prompt_fragment: manga art style, dramatic speed lines, exaggerated expressions, screen tone shading, dynamic composition, bold ink work, Japanese comic aesthetic, sequential art, action emphasis, graphic novel style

name: Stained Glass Cathedral
description: Colored glass segment aesthetic with bold lead lines separating vibrant translucent colors. Light passes through creating luminous glow - medieval cathedral window meets art glass craft. Geometric composition with religious or narrative subject matter.
prompt_fragment: stained glass art, colored glass segments, bold lead lines, translucent colors, luminous backlight, cathedral window aesthetic, geometric composition, vibrant glow, medieval craft, light transmission

name: Propaganda Poster Bold
description: Simplified forms with limited bold colors, strong diagonals, and commanding compositions. Socialist realism meets WWII war bonds - simplified heroic figures, dramatic perspective, and powerful graphic impact. Authoritative and instantly readable.
prompt_fragment: propaganda poster style, limited color palette, simplified forms, bold graphics, commanding composition, dramatic angles, heroic figures, strong diagonal lines, authoritative aesthetic, graphic impact
